components.title: Great stories happen to those who can tell them

children.textContent: SHE MOVES US is a communications platform where PUMA celebrates women who move together to achieve and connect – through sport, culture and values.
The PUMA Woman is a force to be reckoned with.
She inspires the women around her to get active and get with the movement – and they inspire her right back.It’s her crew that brings her joy and meaning – and when they win, she wins too.

story.title: We partner with women win to promote gender equality in sports

children.textContent: Through the partnership with Women Win,
we aim to increase the visibility of female athletes and sports role models
and support initiatives that tear down obstacles to girls’ and women’s access to sports. Women Win was started in 2006 as a global women’s fund dedicated to advancing girls’
Dreaming of life on a farm? Here is how you can achieve the dream.
Climbing hills with a beautiful ride.
With the aircon set just so. 20C.
Get out there and get a new perspective.

hero.altText: Aurora borealis and a beautiful waterfall

children.textContent: Learn more about the spectacular aurora borealis..
Aurora Borealis, also known as northern lights have been occurring since the dawn of time. They are always there, even when it is too bright for us to see them. But what are they?
Northern lights are caused by charged particles from the sun interacting with Earth's upper atmosphere at a very high speed.

images.altText: Green aurora borealis in the background of a lake.

children.textContent: The sun is continually pushing out electrically charged particles that travel at 300 and 500 km per second in every direction. Some of these particles leak through the Earth’s magnetic field and are funnelled towards the Earth’s magnetic North and South poles. When the particles from the sun interact with the atoms and molecules high up in the atmosphere, they become exhilarated. Which creates aurora ovals (glowing rings of auroral emission) around the North and South magnetic poles.
Electrically charged particles from the sun

The Earth’s atmosphere consists of different atoms like nitrogen and oxygen. These atoms are what causes the colours we can see in the Northern lights. The atoms become exhilarated at different levels in the atmosphere. Green is the most common colour, whereas purple and red are more rare.

images.altText: Green aurora borealis and sunset in the background of a lake.

children.textContent: Your best chance of seeing the northern lights is by being either under or close to the aurora ovals. The further north you travel, the more likely you are to see them. Some of the best places to see the northern lights are Svalbard and northern Norway.

images.altText: Green, blue and purple aurora borealis.

children.textContent: Swiss chocolates are world-famous. Brands like Cailler, Toblerone, Nestlé and are Lindt featured in shops all over the globe. Want to learn more?
Cailler is Switzerlands oldest chocolate company, founded by François-Louis Cailler in 1819.
Nestlé was initially focusing on baby formula, but after joining forces with Milkmaid in 1905, the first Nestlé chocolate was made. They continued with developing more chocolate in the 20th century.
Lindt & Sprüngli, more commonly known as just Lindt are famous for their truffles and chocolate bars.

Iceberg not Carlsberg,  not Spielberg, not Jarlsberg. The ice.
… the story behind a good brew.
A coffee seed germinates in anything from 2 1/2 months to 6 months.
It can take 3-5 years for a new coffee plant to flower and grow fruits.
Once ripe it is time to harvest the fruits.
Ripe coffee fruit. The beans are the seeds inside the fruit. They need to be fermented or seperated before the beans can be dried.
Coffee beans are dried after they have been separated from the fruit.
The dried green beans can be stored in 6-9 months before they should be roasted.
After the beans are roasted they need to be cooled as quickly as possible. Here beans are cooled in a Giesen W6 Roaster.
There are several ways to grind your coffee beans depending on your brew method. Here you see an espresso grind. The finest grind.
Now it is time to enjoy. Here a cup of hand brew coffee. All in all a journey that can take over 5 years from a seed is planted.

Simple and unpretentious, our trusted Torrentshell 3L Jacket uses 3-layer H2No™ Performance Standard technology for exceptional waterproof/breathable performance, all-day comfort and long-lasting waterproof durability. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.

properties.100% Recycled Waterproof/Breathable Face: 3-layer waterproof/breathable H2No™ Performance Standard shell provides the highest levels of comfort and performance, long-term waterproof durability; Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
properties.Adjustable Hood: Two-way-adjustable hood with a laminated visor rolls down and stows with a simplified cord-and-hook design
properties.Microfleece-Lined Neck: Microfleece-lined neck provides comfort and protects with a waterproof/breathable barrier
properties.Center-Front Zipper: Snag-free center-front zipper with external and internal storm flaps and zipper-garage chin guard
properties.Pocket Features: Two zippered handwarmer pockets and venting pit zips; all with welted exterior storm flaps and DWR (durable water repellent)-treated zippers
properties.Hook-and-Loop Closures: Self-fabric hook-and-loop cuff closures and an adjustable drawcord hem seal out precipitation
